description:
Updated with ABUS’ XPlus lock cylinder, this version of the 6000 series lock is more pick-resistant than ever before. When a U-Lock just won’t fit, or you don’t want to carry one, the Bordo 6000 is a great way to help protect your bike. At 90cm long, this lock fits around big or oddly shaped objects. And the flexible design resists leverage attacks, while the hardened steel links provides protection from chopping and cutting.

  • XPlus lock cylinder is incredibly pick-resistant
  • 5mm hardened steel bars are strong and durable
  • Link construction with drill resistant rivets allows for compact folding
  • Soft rubber coating protects your bike’s paint job
  • Includes 2 coded reversible keys
  • Attaches with Velcro straps or screws
  • Abus security rating: 10/15 and Sold Secure gives it a bronze rating (suitable for medium risk areas)
name: Abus Bordo XPlus 6000 Key Folding Lock
